sqlMap.insert:
insert into goods_presell_rack ( goods_id,merchant_id,group_price,begin_time,end_time,is_allowrefund, clustering_num,true_buyer_num,virtual_buyer_num,is_cluster,cluster_type, seo_title,seo_keyword,seo_description,is_rack,rack_time,inspectors, is_cash, is_fft_point,is_bank_point, is_fftpoint_cash, is_bankpoint_cash, is_fftpointcash_ratio_pricing, is_bankpointcash_ratio_pricing, cash_pricing, fft_point_pricing, bank_point_pricing, fftpoint_cash_pricing, bankpoint_cash_pricing, fftpointcash_ratio_pricing, bankpointcash_ratio_pricing,state, buy_know,seller_id,goods_rack_detail,delivery_start_time,delivery_end_time, create_time,update_time,remark,priority,max_sale_num ) values( #goodsId#,#merchantId#,#groupPrice#,#beginTime#,#endTime#,#isAllowrefund#, #clusteringNum#,0,0,0,1, #seoTitle#, #seoKeyword#,#seoDescription#,0,#rackTime#,#inspectors#, #isCash#,#isFftPoint#, #isBankPoint#,#isFftpointCash#,#isBankpointCash#, #isFftpointcashRatioPricing#,#isBankpointcashRatioPricing#, #cashPricing#,#fftPointPricing#,#bankPointPricing#, #fftpointCashPricing#,#bankpointCashPricing#,#fftpointcashRatioPricing#,#bankpointcashRatioPricing#,20, #buyKnow#,#sellerId#,#goodsRackDetail#,#deliveryStartTime#,#deliveryEndTime#, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s"),#remark#,#priority#,#maxSaleNum# )
select last_insert_id() as id
sqlMap.update:
update goods_presell_rack set update_time=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d|%H:%i:%s")
goods_id=#goodsId#
merchant_id=#merchantId#
group_price=#groupPrice#
begin_time=#beginTime#
end_time=#endTime#
is_allowrefund=#isAllowrefund#
clustering_num=#clusteringNum#
true_buyer_num=#trueBuyerNum#
virtual_buyer_num=#virtualBuyerNum#
is_cluster=#isCluster#
cluster_type=#clusterType#
seo_title = #seoTitle:VARCHAR#
seo_keyword = #seoKeyword:VARCHAR#
seo_description = #seoDescription:VARCHAR#
is_rack = #isRack:VARCHAR#
rack_time = #rackTime:VARCHAR#
inspectors = #inspectors:VARCHAR#
is_cash = #isCash:VARCHAR#
is_fft_point = #isFftPoint:VARCHAR#
is_bank_point = #isBankPoint:VARCHAR#
is_fftpoint_cash = #isFftpointCash:VARCHAR#
is_bankpoint_cash = #isBankpointCash:VARCHAR#
is_fftpointcash_ratio_pricing = #isFftpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#
is_bankpointcash_ratio_pricing = #isBankpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#
cash_pricing = #cashPricing:VARCHAR#
fft_point_pricing = #fftPointPricing:VARCHAR#
bank_point_pricing = #bankPointPricing:VARCHAR#
fftpoint_cash_pricing = #fftpointCashPricing:VARCHAR#
bankpoint_cash_pricing = #bankpointCashPricing:VARCHAR#
fftpointcash_ratio_pricing = #fftpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#
bankpointcash_ratio_pricing = #bankpointcashRatioPricing:VARCHAR#
state = #state:VARCHAR#
seller_id = #sellerId#
buy_know = #buyKnow#
delivery_start_time = #deliveryStartTime#
delivery_end_time = #deliveryEndTime#
goods_rack_detail = #goodsRackDetail#
remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
priority = #priority#
max_sale_num = #maxSaleNum#
where id=#id#
sqlMap.select:
select * from goods_presell_rack where #endTime#>end_time
state=#state#
order by end_time desc limit #startRow#,#pageSize#
